BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-WavefrontOBJ
BundleInfo.Author: UCSF RBVI
BundleInfo.Description: This bundle provides the ability to read and write Wavefront OBJ files.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: DataFormat :: Wavefront OBJ :: obj :: Generic 3D objects :: .obj :: :: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wavefront_.obj_file :: :: :: Surface format used in 3D modeling :: utf-8
